hints.title: Modified Einstein Field Equations with Sources
hints.content:
183: :label: thm-modified-einstein-equations
184: 
185: Given that $\nabla_\mu T^{\mu\nu} = J^\nu$ ({prf:ref}`thm-energy-momentum-source`) and $\nabla_\mu G^{\mu\nu} = 0$ (Bianchi identity), the consistency argument in {prf:ref}`thm-einstein-field-equations` leads to:
186: 
187: $$
188: \nabla_\mu G^{\mu\nu} = \kappa J^\nu
189: $$
190: 
191: Equivalently, defining an **effective stress-energy tensor**:
192: 
193: $$
194: T_{\mu\nu}^{\text{eff}} := T_{\mu\nu} + T_{\mu\nu}^{\text{bath}}
195: $$
196: 
197: where $T_{\mu\nu}^{\text{bath}}$ satisfies $\nabla_\mu T^{\mu\nu}_{\text{bath}} = -J^\nu$, the field equations become:
198: 
199: $$
200: G_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G \, T_{\mu\nu}^{\text{eff}}
201: $$
202: 
203: with $\nabla_\mu (T^{\mu\nu}_{\text{eff}}) = 0$.
